title: Pipeline job support tables without unique key
body:
Related to #22500

Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - Pipeline job support tables without unique key
  - Add E2E IT test

Tables without primary keys currently do not support data consistency checks, it's will be ignored.

eg.
```
mysql> show  MIGRATION check status 'j01018f00c0a95509ff8e7066269c23bb165e';
+--------------+--------+---------------------+-------------------+------------------+----------------+------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| tables       | result | finished_percentage | remaining_seconds | check_begin_time | check_end_time | duration_seconds | error_message                                                             |
+--------------+--------+---------------------+-------------------+------------------+----------------+------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| t_order_item | false  | 0                   | 0                 |                  |                | 0                | Data consistency check are not supported for tables without primary keys |
+--------------+--------+---------------------+-------------------+------------------+----------------+------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 row in set (7.31 sec)
```


---

title: Improve pipeline data source creator
body:
Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - Refactor ShardingSpherePipelineDataSourceCreator to use YamlShardingSphereDataSourceFactory, replace ShardingSphereDataSourceFactory, it's more fundemental and flexible, and code could be simplified in ShardingSpherePipelineDataSourceCreator
  - Close created data sources in DataSourcePoolCreator.create when failure and cache disabled, to avoid possible data source leak
  - Clone new YamlRootConfiguration in ShardingSpherePipelineDataSourceCreator.createPipelineDataSource, to avoid possible data corruption in original yamlRootConfig

---
